own.name: WebStudio
own.description: WebStudio – personal study project of virtual web studio site. Adaptive multi-page site. All layout is completely mine.

own.name: BarberShop
own.description: BarberShop - personal study project of a hair salon for men. Landing page with mobile first. All layout is completely mine.

own.name: Image Finder
own.description: Image Finder - personal study project of application to search and view images by keyword. For HTTP requests was used the public Pixabay API.

own.name: Capo del Design
own.description: Capo del Design - my own project of personal adaptive and responsive web site for interior designer. Landing page with mobile first.

own.name: Movie Search
own.description: Movie Search - personal study project of movie search and storage application. For the backend was used the themoviedb.org API.

own.name: Phone Book application
own.description: Phone Book application - personal study project of web-application for creating your own phone book, with ability to login.

team.name: Donut Masterclass
team.description: Donut Masterclass project [after HTML/CSS course] - mobile-first adaptive web site of donut masterclass. Neat and tasty design, responsive layout.
team.tasks: My tasks: section Registration, animation of the donuts , scroll-up button, stylization of validating (if the data is entered incorrectly, appears a cross and the line is highlighted in red, if is successful - appears a green check-mark and the line is highlighted in green).

team.name: Event booster
team.description: Event booster project [after JS course] -  mobile-first adaptive and responsive web site for finding events in the world, with ability to choose an event by name and country and buy tickets.
team.tasks: My tasks: background rendering (mobile, tablet, desktop), themes switcher, team-modal window, dynamic scroll-up button, section Footer, all visual part of application interface at light theme, animation of the main title, animation of movement of the selected page in pagination.

team.name: Kapu$ta
team.description: Kapu$ta project [after React & Node.js course] -  mobile-first adaptive and responsive web site for finding events in the world, with ability to choose an event by name, country and buy tickets.
team.tasks: My tasks: background rendering (mobile, tablet, desktop), themes switcher, team-modal window, dynamic scroll-up button, section Footer,  all visual part in the light theme and animation.

team.name: Edora
team.description: Edora project [after React & Golang course] -  marketplace with safe purchase and convenient delivery.
team.tasks: My tasks: getting ads from the database; pagination, filtering, sorting ads; saving all search queries into URL for the ability to share the link; currency conversion (API of Privat Bank); page scroll up; «Home» & «About us» pages.

others.name: Covid-19
others.description: Covid-19 - application about Coronavirus (covid-19) daily infected, recovery, and  death information global and by selected countries.

others.name: JsClock
others.description: JsClock - simple Background Change Clock application. Every second background change when clock time change.

others.name: Countdown timer
others.description: Countdown timer - a custom timer plugin that counts down to a predefined date. Can be used on blogs, event registration pages, etc.
